item.title: CV
item.description:
Lennart Kiil’s CV

  • Phone: +45 40 26 18 72
  • Email: lennartkiil@gmail.com
  • Location: Copenhagen
  • Website: www.lennartkiil.com
  • LinkedIn: lennartkiil
  • GitHub: kiil

Introduction

Two decades of experience as a communicator and lately an intense interest in and rapidly growing experience with AI technology based on Large Language Models.

Experience

Folkets Avis, Lead AI Engineer

  • 2023 – present
  • Created artificial intelligence interpolation workflows.
  • Created automatic post generation with integrated source grounding.
  • Created editorial team of AI Agents with specialised roles with “prompted personalities”.
  • Created internal RAG for semantic search available to both AI Agents and human editorial team.

Humanice, Founder

  • 2023 – present
  • First Danish media-based “Human in the loop”-LLM content creation platform.
  • Giving human editorial teams generative artificial intelligence tools at their fingertips.
  • Meeting clients deadlines with human approved and fact checked high quality text content.

Kiils, Founder

  • 2011 – present
  • Solving AI problems for some of the biggest companies in the Danish auto leasing industry integrating RAG-solution and sales text generation with pre-existing fleet management system.
  • Creating assistive generative content creation and source grounding strategies for a succesful NGO in the nature conservation field.
  • Helping big institutions and organisations improve internal and external communications.
  • Helping universities, hospitals and publications in science communication, from popular science journalism to highly domain specific expert knowledge.

Klimaleksikon, Co-founder, Editor

  • 2008 – present
  • Denmark’s most widely used informal digital learning platform about climate change.

ZenSci Consult, Co-founder

  • 2004 – 2010
  • Science communications for a host of publications and institutions.

Education

University of Aarhus, Master in Biology

  • 1997 – 2003

DMJX, Supplement in Journalism

  • 2003 – 2004

Books

Kok’n’roll, DreamLitt

  • 2017
  • Lennart Kiil

Bionik — chapter on Bioloch, University of Copenhagen

  • 2004
  • Lennart Kiil, Thomas Hesselberg

Projects

Awesome ChatGPT Personas

  • github.com/kiil/acp
  • Writing styles in OpenAI’s chatGPT through Myers–Briggs Type Indicators.

Positions of Trust

Dansk Presseforbund, Board Member

  • 2010 – 2014

Danske Videnskabsjournalister, Board Member

  • 2006 – 2010

Programming Languages

  • Nushell: Versatile shell and functional language perfectly suited for AI workflows, integrations and rapid prototyping.
  • Python: The de facto standard for Natural Language Processing and generative artificial intelligence.

Tools

  • MarvinAI: General purpose AI Engineering Toolkit.

Language Skills

  • Danish: Mother tongue
  • English: Highly proficient
  • German: Proficient
  • Spanish: Proficient

item.title: Metoo and the Media
item.description:
All but died out, no interest from the Danish populace. But then reignited by media Sofie Linde.

Moved power to the media

Morten Østergaard

item.title: Krabby Patty recipe
item.description:
Ingredients:

For 4 people :

  • Lots of love
  • 2 cans of crab meat
  • 1 lightly beaten egg
  • 1/2 lemon juice
  • Breadcrumbs
  • 1 tomato
  • Hamburger bread
  • Pickles
  • 1 onion
  • 4 salad leaves
  • Frying oil
  • Salt pepper

For the sauce:

  • Worcestershire sauce
  • Ketchup
  • Mustard

Steps :

  • In a bowl, beat 1 egg then add the crabmeat, breadcrumbs, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Mix until you get a homogeneous consistency.

  • Then form crab pâté steaks and brown them in a pan with a drizzle of frying oil for 4 to 5 minutes on each side.

item.title: About me
item.description:
I’m a sea sponge who works as a fry cook at the Krusty Krab:

The Krusty Krabe is a fast food restaurant known for it’s signature burger:

The Krabby Patty

Try to make one yourself and you will be as happy as I am.

My first Krabby Patty

You can take a look at the recipe here .
